column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A foreign male was found dead on Street 174
column9: 2019 at 7:20 am.------The local police said  ALAN ROLF JENSEN was a 54-year-old male from Australia.------After the incident
column10: the police force called for technical assistance to find the cause of death
column11: which has not yet been made public.------Jesen
column12: known as ‘King Kong’ was------ arrested in 2013------ on drug trafficking charges.------UPDATE: Cause of death has been given as heart attack from excessive meth use.
